name: From TV Animation - One Piece: Set Sail Pirate Crew!
summary: From TV animation - One Piece: Set Sail Pirate Crew! (Ｆｒｏｍ ＴＶ ａｎｉｍａｔｉｏｎ ワンピース とびだせ海賊団！ From TV Animation - Wan Pīsu: Tobidase Kaizoku-dan!) is a Japan-exclusive role-playing game created by Bandai for the PlayStation. It is the fourth game to be based on the One Piece manga and anime. This game's introduction uses the theme song Believe from the One Piece Anime.

alternative_names.name: From TV Animation - Wan Pīsu: Tobidase Kaizoku-dan!
One Piece: Set Sail Pirate Crew!
